author: Filippo La Mantia
title: Cooking in quarantine: A dish that tastes like my Italian home
description: A chef in Milan shares the simple recipe from his Sicilian childhood that he has been craving while in lockdown.
content:
When you usually work 18 hours a day as a chef and restaurateur, changing your lifestyle is not so easy. For chefs, cooking is not a job, it is a passion. So closing my restaurant in Milan was traumatic.
